personalInfo.name: Chitresh Gyanani
personalInfo.bio: Software Engineer and GenAI specialist with strong experience designing and delivering production-grade AI platforms, backend systems, and full-stack SaaS products. I specialize in LLM engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), knowledge-graph-powered chatbots, realtime AI systems, and scalable backend architectures using Python, FastAPI, and Django. My work spans enterprise AI governance platforms, developer tooling, analytics systems, and ML-driven automation, with a strong focus on clean architecture, data science rigor, reliability, and measurable business impact.
personalInfo.tagline: Designing and shipping production-grade AI and data systems at scale

projects.title: ExtracTable – Production-Grade PDF Table Extraction Platform
projects.description: ExtracTable is a SaaS-ready backend platform for automated table extraction from PDFs, designed for reliability, scale, and cost transparency. The system processes uploaded documents asynchronously using Celery and Redis, extracts structured tables using Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite, and delivers high-quality, styled Excel outputs. The platform includes comprehensive API validation, JWT-based authentication with strict user isolation, detailed token counting for every AI request, cost estimation, monthly usage tracking, success-rate analytics, and a scalable pricing-tier foundation. Extensive internal documentation covers API references, system architecture, database schema, deployment workflows, AI integration strategies, monitoring, and security best practices.

projects.title: KeyNest – Secure Environment Variable Management for Teams
projects.description: KeyNest is an open-source, security-first platform for managing environment variables across teams, projects, and environments. It provides AES-256 encryption at rest, role-based access control, JWT authentication, complete audit logging, and enterprise-grade CSRF/CORS protection. The system supports organizations, projects, and multiple environment types (development, staging, production), enabling fine-grained permission management and secure collaboration. Designed with developer experience in mind, it includes .env import/export, real-time updates, search and filtering, and Docker/Kubernetes-friendly deployment.

projects.title: AI Hub Agent (UKG) – Enterprise AI Use Case Intelligence Platform
projects.description: An enterprise FastAPI-based platform that centralizes AI use cases across business units and enables semantic, analytical, and realtime interaction with organizational AI initiatives. The system syncs SharePoint data via Microsoft Graph into a MongoDB Atlas vector store, enabling RAG-based semantic search and high-performance tabular analytics using Polars. It supports multi-agent orchestration (Orchestrator, Read, Write agents) with Semantic Kernel, guided intake workflows, and leadership reporting aligned to PARC success metrics. The platform also includes realtime voice-to-voice and speech-to-text capabilities using Azure OpenAI Realtime APIs, supporting HTTP, WebSocket, and WebRTC flows for low-latency conversational analytics.
